info.title: PINS Back Office API
info.description: PINS Back Office API documentation from Swagger

get.description: Returns the application by its string reference

post.description: Moves application from Draft state to Pre-Application state

get.description: Gets all of the application details

description.example: A description of test case 1 which is a case of subsector type Office Use

200.description: response will have the date that the case was published as a timestamp

get.description: Gets list of representations on an application

parameters.name: sortBy
parameters.description: Sort by field. +field for ASC, -field for DESC

post.description: Creates a representation for an application

get.description: Gets a representation on an application

patch.description: Updates a representation for an application

redactedBy.example: A users name who has performed a redaction

get.description: Downloads VALID representations on an application

patch.description: Redact a representation for an application

parameters.name: body
parameters.description:
Representation redact details 
 type can be REDACT_STATUS or REDACT. If REDACT_STATUS then redactedRepresentation is not a mandatory field but redactStatus will be.

delete.description: Delete a representation contact for an application

post.description: Add a representation attachment for an application document

delete.description: Delete a representation attachment for an application document

patch.description: Update a representation status for an application and create an action

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Status body to update a rep stats and create a rep action

post.description: This endpoint enables the storage of metadata for a document linked to a particular case, whether it is newly created or updated.

parameters.name: guid
parameters.description: guid of the required document here

200.description: The metadata has been successfully stored.

post.description: Saves new documents to database and returns location in Blob Storage

206.description: Some documents failed to save while others succeeded

post.description: Saves new documents to database and returns location in Blob Storage

parameters.name: guid
parameters.description: guid of the required document here

patch.description: Updates the status and/or redaction status on an array of documents

parameters.description: guid of the required document here

parameters.name: guid

parameters.description: version of the required document here

get.description: Gets the properties of a single file on a case

parameters.name: guid
parameters.description: guid of the required document here

post.description: Reverts the published status of a document to the previous status
Deletes a document associated with a specific application

parameters.name: guid
parameters.description: guid of the required document here

200.description: The document has been successfully soft-deleted and is no longer accessible.

description.example: Indicates whether the document has been successfully soft-deleted.

post.description: Gets all documents that are ready to publish for the case

200.description: An paginated data set of documents and their properties

patch.description: Publishes the documents selected from the Ready to Publish queue

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Array of document guids to publish

get.description: Gets list of top level folders on a case
Gets details of a single folder on a case
Gets the parent folder path list for a folder on a case

post.description: Gets paginated array of documents in a folder on a case

200.description: An paginated data set of documents and their properties

parameters.description: The number of results per page, defaults to 25
